FuncDef:
The pw command displays the view of a specified PW.
The undo pw command deletes all the configurations of a specified PW.
By default, no PW is configured. The view of a specified PW can be displayed only after the PW is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a PW.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To display the view of a specified PW and set related parameters, run the pw command.
Precautions
This command displays the PW view only and cannot be used to create PWs.
